metadata.name: #2 Shane Mac
metadata.description: Shane Mac is cofounder of XMTP which is powering the Web3 Messaging Layer, technology entrepreneur and crypto OG (originally involved with Bitcoin in 2011.) In this episode we discuss Web3 Decentralized Social and Messaging, New XMTP powered app Converse, why the world needs to own their messaging like they own their assets and why WhatsApp may not be as secure as you think...
